DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To estimate objective tumor response rate patient KIT-positive , unresectable , locally advanced metastatic acral mucosal melanoma treat dasatinib monotherapy . Secondary - To estimate response duration patient treat drug . - To estimate progression-free survival patient treated drug . - To evaluate safety profile drug patient . - To evaluate PDGFR expression activation Src family kinases tumor sample correlate parameter response treatment . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive oral dasatinib twice daily day 1-21 . Courses repeat every 21 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Tissue sample may collect patient correlative study . After completion study therapy , patient follow periodically 5 year .
